title: Only the Conservatives can defeat Labour's 'dither and duplicity' on Brexit
text:
In an era where most politicians choose the line of least resistance Boris Johnson’s premiership already stands out as something different. Most leaders play the long game and play it safe. Boris is willing to take risk.

Europe has been a difficult issue for many of his predecessors with many becoming swamped and some capsizing. Boris has turned the ship straight into the wind.

Whether people agree or disagree with his policy direction, largely whether they were leavers or remainers, it is clear he refuses to be a prisoner of events. It is particularly important at this point in our history, especially in the context of Brexit, that the government has a clear political compass.

The current House...
description: In an era where most politicians choose the line of least resistance Boris Johnson’s premiership already stands out as something different.
